005
006package gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.constraint;
007
008import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.ISource;
009import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.util.CollectionUtil;
010
011import java.util.LinkedList;
012import java.util.List;
013import java.util.concurrent.locks.Lock;
014
015import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.NonNull;
016
017/**
018 * Represents a container of rules constraining the effective model of a
019 * Metaschema assembly data instance.
020 */
021@SuppressWarnings("PMD.CouplingBetweenObjects")
022public class AssemblyConstraintSet
023    extends ValueConstraintSet
024    implements IModelConstrained {
025
026  @NonNull
027  private final List<IIndexConstraint> indexConstraints = new LinkedList<>();
028  @NonNull
029  private final List<IUniqueConstraint> uniqueConstraints = new LinkedList<>();
030  @NonNull
031  private final List<ICardinalityConstraint> cardinalityConstraints = new LinkedList<>();
032
033  /**
034   * Construct a new constraint set.
035   *
036   * @param source
037   *          information about the resource the constraints were sources from
038   */
039  public AssemblyConstraintSet(@NonNull ISource source) {
040    super(source);
041  }
042
043  @Override
044  public List<IIndexConstraint> getIndexConstraints() {
045    Lock readLock = instanceLock.readLock();
046    readLock.lock();
047    try {
048      return CollectionUtil.unmodifiableList(indexConstraints);
049    } finally {
050      readLock.unlock();
051    }
052  }
053
054  @Override
055  public List<IUniqueConstraint> getUniqueConstraints() {
056    Lock readLock = instanceLock.readLock();
057    readLock.lock();
058    try {
059      return CollectionUtil.unmodifiableList(uniqueConstraints);
060    } finally {
061      readLock.unlock();
062    }
063  }
064
065  @Override
066  public List<ICardinalityConstraint> getHasCardinalityConstraints() {
067    Lock readLock = instanceLock.readLock();
068    readLock.lock();
069    try {
070      return CollectionUtil.unmodifiableList(cardinalityConstraints);
071    } finally {
072      readLock.unlock();
073    }
074  }
075
076  @Override
077  public final void addConstraint(@NonNull IIndexConstraint constraint) {
078    Lock writeLock = instanceLock.writeLock();
079    writeLock.lock();
080    try {
081      constraints.add(constraint);
082      indexConstraints.add(constraint);
083    } finally {
084      writeLock.unlock();
085    }
086  }
087
088  @Override
089  public final void addConstraint(@NonNull IUniqueConstraint constraint) {
090    Lock writeLock = instanceLock.writeLock();
091    writeLock.lock();
092    try {
093      constraints.add(constraint);
094      uniqueConstraints.add(constraint);
095    } finally {
096      writeLock.unlock();
097    }
098  }
099
100  @Override
101  public final void addConstraint(@NonNull ICardinalityConstraint constraint) {
102    Lock writeLock = instanceLock.writeLock();
103    writeLock.lock();
104    try {
105      constraints.add(constraint);
106      cardinalityConstraints.add(constraint);
107    } finally {
108      writeLock.unlock();
109    }
110  }
111}
